EmailTemplate.name: 3.1 Training reminder (5 days before)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your training starts on {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Start_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Owner_email__c}
Dear {!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Candidate_Name__c},
I am writing to you in order to confirm the details of your training session with us.
{!HR_Event__c.Date_time_location__c}
The training session will include various lively group activities and role specific training, so please wear appropriate clothing. Please bring a notepad and pen along with you and prepare two icebreaker games/exercises to share with the group.
Lunch will be provided; we can offer vegetarian options but unfortunately we cannot accommodate other specific dietary requirements. If you have specific dietary requirements please bring your own lunch.
What do you need to bring for your DBS and Right to Work verification?
All staff must bring all the following documents for DBS verification depending on which option applies to you
Option 1) You have an existing enhanced DBS dated after April 30th 2013, please bring
- Your original DBS certificate with you to training
Option 2) You have applied for a DBS through The Challenge, please bring
- Your DBS certificate (if you have received this)
- All three documents used to process your DBS
All staff must bring all the following ID documents for Right To Work verification depending on which option applies to you
Option 1) Passport (with a valid visa where appropriate) or National Identity Card
Option 2) Original birth certificate AND National Insurance Card
N.B we are in the process of allocating staff so we will be in touch soon to discuss work schedules.
Please click on the link below for directions:
{!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Extra_info__c}
{!HR_Event_Attendance__c.Packing_list__c}.
We look forward to seeing you again!
Best wishes,
{!HR_Event_Attendance__c.HR_Event_Owner_email__c}
NCS with The Challenge
CR 3.1
